original_text: As soon as he did this, the men in the ambush rose quickly from their position and rushed forward. They entered the city and captured it and quickly set it on fire.
korean_text: 그의 손을 드는 순간에 복병이 그들의 자리에서 급히 일어나 성읍으로 달려 들어가서 점령하고 곧 성읍에 불을 놓았더라

sentences.original_text: As soon as he did this
the men in the ambush rose quickly from their position
sentences.korean_translation: 매복했던 남자들이 자기 자리에서 빠르게 일어났고

sentences.original_text: and quickly set it on fire
